FIRSTNAME_MIN_REQ: First Name must be atleast 4 characters long.
LASTNAME_MIN_REQ: Last Name must be atleast 4 characters long.
USERNAME_MIN_REQ: User Name must be atleast 4 characters long.
EMAIL_MIN_REQ: Email must be at least 4 characters long.
EMAIL_MAX_REQ: Email cannot be more than 24 characters long.
PWD_MIN_REQ: Password should be minimum 6 charaters long
PWD_PATTERN: Password must contain 6 or more characters with at least a number.
VALID_ZIPCODE_REQ: Please enter a valid zip code.
PHONE_MAX_REQ: Phone Number must be max 10 characters.
SR_DESC_CHARACTERS: Description must be min 10 and max 1000 characters.
QUOTE_DESC_CHARACTERS: Description cannot be more than 1000 characters.
COMMENT_CHARACTERS: Comment cannot be more than 545 characters.
MAX_DESCRIPTION: Description cannot be more than 545 characters.
COMMENT_MIN_REQ: Comments must be atleast 5 characters long.
COMMENT_MAX_CHARACTERS: Comment cannot be more than 1000 characters.
